Title: Relates to requiring children enrolled in an overnight, children's non-regulated, summer day, or travelling camp to be vaccinated
Summary: Requires children enrolled in an overnight, children's non-regulated, summer day, or travelling camp to be vaccinated against a specified list of diseases.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring children enrolled in an overnight, children's non-regulated, summer day, or travelling camp to be vaccinated
